findings.issue: Use of MD5
findings.description: MD5 is cryptographically broken
findings.recommendation: Use SHA-256 or better for hashing. Use crypto.randomBytes() for random values.

findings.issue: API versioning not detected
findings.description: Consider implementing API versioning for future compatibility
